data.Name: Allie X
data.Bio: Alexandra Ashley Hughes, known by her stage name Allie X, is a Canadian singer-songwriter based in Los Angeles, California. Since her musical debut as Allie X in 2014, she has released 2 albums, "CollXtion II" (2017), "Cape God" (2020) and 2 EP's, "CollXtion I" (2015), & Super Sunset (2018). Trained in musical theatre, she worked in musicals and was a contestant on Canadian reality show "How Do You Solve A Problem Like Maria?" She left theatre to Read more on Last.fm
